committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to designate the Wildcat River in the State of New Hampshire as a unit of the National Wild and Scenic River System.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate Wildcat River, New Hampshire, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Wildcat River Advisory Commission to assist in implementing this Act. Terminates such commission ten years after enactment of this Act. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Wildcat River in the State of New Hampshire as a unit of the National Wild and Scenic River System.
